title: Mayhem - Dawn Of The Black Hearts
description:
Dawn of the Black Hearts is a live bootleg album by the Norwegian black metal band Mayhem. It is infamous for bearing a photograph of Mayhem&#039;s vocalist, Dead (Per Yngve Ohlin), after his suicide in April 1991. This photograph was taken by Mayhem&#039;s guitarist, Euronymous (ÃƒÆ’Ã‹Å“ystein Aarseth), upon discovering Dead&#039;s body. Despite only being a "semi-official" release, this notorious bootleg is commonly listed as one of the band&#039;s main albums.
